alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 16 at 11:13AM EST until January 16 at 11:45AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Hendry County in southern Florida... Northwestern Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 1145 AM EST. * At 1113 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lake Harbor, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Harbor around 1125 AM EST. South Bay around 1130 AM EST. Belle Glade Camp around 1135 AM EST. Belle Glade around 1140 AM EST. Pahokee, Canal Point and Fremd Village-Padgett Island around 1145 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Harlem. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
